# **omi**

[Permalink: omi](https://github.com/BasedHardware/omi/tree/main#omi)

Meet Omi, the worldâ€™s leading open-source AI wearable that captures conversations, gives summaries, action items and does actions for you. Simply connect Omi to your mobile device and enjoy automatic, high-quality
transcriptions of meetings, chats, and voice memos wherever you are.

[![Omi](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/4256921/402814578-834d3fdb-31b5-4f22-ae35-da3d2b9a8f59.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..J9oUz4AIss19sHomoKATG5b3sF2aSMIVeqNx8Dv-p-U)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/4256921/402814578-834d3fdb-31b5-4f22-ae35-da3d2b9a8f59.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..J9oUz4AIss19sHomoKATG5b3sF2aSMIVeqNx8Dv-p-U)[![Image](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43514161/492112562-fdad4226-e5ce-4c55-b547-9101edfa3203.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..bbmIdMaCBLJEAoTBndbXICkOv5Vo7slrAP7LcnE27M0)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43514161/492112562-fdad4226-e5ce-4c55-b547-9101edfa3203.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..bbmIdMaCBLJEAoTBndbXICkOv5Vo7slrAP7LcnE27M0)

[Permalink: Site |   Download   | Docs | Buy omi Dev Kit | Buy Omi Glass Dev Kit](https://github.com/BasedHardware/omi/tree/main#site----download----docs--buy-omi-dev-kit--buy-omi-glass-dev-kit)

## ðŸš€ Quick Start for Developers (2 min)

[Permalink: ðŸš€ Quick Start for Developers (2 min)](https://github.com/BasedHardware/omi/tree/main#-quick-start-for-developers-2-min)

Get the omi app running locally:

```
git clone https://github.com/BasedHardware/omi.git
cd omi/app

bash setup.sh ios     # android, macos
```

## Create your own App (1 min)

[Permalink: Create your own App (1 min)](https://github.com/BasedHardware/omi/tree/main#create-your-own-app-1-min)

Download omi App

[![Get it on Google Play](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/cf167235ef2ee6764e09f27330d31e7076ad80b4aae3dfa8902a7ed4b95c65e4/68747470733a2f2f75706c6f61642e77696b696d656469612e6f72672f77696b6970656469612f636f6d6d6f6e732f372f37382f476f6f676c655f506c61795f53746f72655f62616467655f454e2e737667)](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.friend.ios)[![Download on the App Store](https://camo.githubusercontent.com/259c48a2ee0a9cda65bc80f532c853186a4d87e9b0505e052c0b7ca2c1911825/68747470733a2f2f75706c6f61642e77696b696d656469612e6f72672f77696b6970656469612f636f6d6d6f6e732f332f33632f446f776e6c6f61645f6f6e5f7468655f4170705f53746f72655f42616467652e737667)](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/friend-ai-wearable/id6502156163)[![Download MacOS app](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43514161/503170828-59c47ec7-3da0-47d7-be2f-7467e4189499.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..gz_XX9WKBi4wdspqUySB9z50QOBLFJ-KU-JFQsmDz1w)](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/omi-ai-smart-meeting-notes/id6502156163)

Create webhook using [webhook.site](https://webhook.site/) and copy this url

[![](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43514161/425263468-083a6ec4-4694-4c7a-843a-4a1a0c254453.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..aS0RWhYlfeupp_RfXnfk4r64vIJHXXfNhjTqM4Nf9Kg)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43514161/425263468-083a6ec4-4694-4c7a-843a-4a1a0c254453.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..aS0RWhYlfeupp_RfXnfk4r64vIJHXXfNhjTqM4Nf9Kg)

In omi App:

| Explore => Create an App | Select Capability | Paste Webhook URL | Install App |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| [![](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43514161/425262667-31809b81-7de2-4381-b5fc-5c9714972211.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..EZwdgDTeHHr3G_mv0Zouup1UennLeyKDp3rf0y_hsso)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43514161/425262667-31809b81-7de2-4381-b5fc-5c9714972211.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..EZwdgDTeHHr3G_mv0Zouup1UennLeyKDp3rf0y_hsso) | [![](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43514161/425268337-59cfbe8e-7e3b-437f-81f7-25eb50ccdd7d.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.._cpKpvmpFhb8et9ombMB5K-rTTU_2_i7mJFqyiAtnOg)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43514161/425268337-59cfbe8e-7e3b-437f-81f7-25eb50ccdd7d.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.._cpKpvmpFhb8et9ombMB5K-rTTU_2_i7mJFqyiAtnOg) | [![](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43514161/425267454-3d864ee8-555f-4ded-b4db-87ff78128323.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..y_sEZz3sBvKjD1B-bLPgflZO5CxxPQ47iPgVwcZ0zrg)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43514161/425267454-3d864ee8-555f-4ded-b4db-87ff78128323.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..y_sEZz3sBvKjD1B-bLPgflZO5CxxPQ47iPgVwcZ0zrg) | [![](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43514161/425269783-58cf6da6-e245-415e-92e7-dc1f46583cfc.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..Nn7QrOOufi5zPSLcSjxpfgzTZTapKLV7_2wAWdFDpgU)](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/43514161/425269783-58cf6da6-e245-415e-92e7-dc1f46583cfc.png?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..Nn7QrOOufi5zPSLcSjxpfgzTZTapKLV7_2wAWdFDpgU) |

Start speaking, you'll see Real-time transcript on [webhook.site](https://webhook.site/).

## In this repo:

[Permalink: In this repo:](https://github.com/BasedHardware/omi/tree/main#in-this-repo)

- [omi device](https://github.com/BasedHardware/omi/blob/main/omi) \- nRF chips, zephyr, c/c++
- [omi glass](https://github.com/BasedHardware/omi/blob/main/omiglass) esp32-s3, c/c++
- [omi app](https://github.com/BasedHardware/omi/blob/main/app) \- flutter
- [omi backend](https://github.com/BasedHardware/omi/blob/main/backend) \- python, fastapi, firebase, pinecone, redis, deepgram, speechmatic, soniox, openai-compatible apis, langchain, silero vad
- [SDKs](https://github.com/BasedHardware/omi/blob/main/sdks) \- react native, swift, python
- [ai personas (web)](https://github.com/BasedHardware/omi/blob/main/web/personas-open-source) \- nextjs

[Permalink: Documentation:](https://github.com/BasedHardware/omi/tree/main#documentation)

- [Integrate your own wearable with omi](https://docs.omi.me/doc/integrations)

## About

AI wearables. Put it on, speak, transcribe, automatically


[omi.me](https://omi.me/ "https://omi.me")
